Name: BOBS Repo
Description: Baby Open Brains: An open-source repository of infant brain segmentations

GeneratedBy.Name: infant-abcd-bids-pipeline
GeneratedBy.Description: T1w and T2w files are preprocessed BCP intermediate pipline outputs from the DCAN-Labs infant-abcd-bids-pipeline

GeneratedBy.Name: Manual
GeneratedBy.Description: Segmentation files were generated with BIBSNet and subsequently manually corrected by trained PrimeNeuro specialists
